evidence.claim: Taiki utilizes AWS and GCP for its cloud infrastructure and data management.
The platform adheres to HIPAA compliance, ensuring protection of sensitive patient information.
Taiki supports FHIR standards for healthcare data interoperability.
Taiki integrates with Snowflake for data warehousing solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of using or offering X12 or EDI services found on public pages.
